help.default: Type `{{prefix}}list` to get a list of all commands or `{{prefix}}help <command name>` to get help on a command.

list.invalidPage: The number of the page must be between 1 and {{page_count}}.

rest.name: command name
rest.description: The name of the command to get help.

list.name: list
list.description: Display a list of all avaible commands.

page.name: page
page.description: The page of the list to display.

misc.guildOnlyWarning: The command `{{command}}` can only be executed from a server.
